description: Earthy sage and roasted chestnuts make a delicious, light healthy stuffing for pork fillet.
keywords: Roast pork,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Pork,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Chestnut & Sage Stuffed Pork Fillet Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large onion, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Heat the butter and half of the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the onions for 5 minutes to soften.
Stir in the chestnuts and sage and cook for 2-3 minutes. Tip into a bowl with the breadcrumbs and mix well.

Slice the pork fillet open lengthways, without cutting all the way through. Lay it flat on a parchment lined baking tray and spoon the stuffing along the middle. Roll up and tie with 4 pieces of string along the length of the fillet.
Brush the pork with the remaining oil and brown on all sides in a hot pan for 2-3 minutes. Roast for 20 or minutes until cooked through. Rest for 10 minutes, slice and serve.
